item.title: Vue Router Cheatsheet
item.description: Insert Lead paragraph here. Vue Router Cheatsheet A quick reference for common Vue Router (v3/v4) tasks. For more details, refer to the Vue Router documentation (Vue 2) or Vue Router v4 docs (Vue 3). 1. Basic Setup // Vue 2 import Vue from 'vue' import VueRouter from 'vue-router' import Home from './views/Home.vue' Vue.use(VueRouter) const routes = [ { path: '/', component: Home }, ] const router = new VueRouter({ routes // short for `routes: routes` }) new Vue({ router, render: h => h(App) }).
